title: tip.golang.org misses some files
body:
by **Pawel.Biernacki**: 
tip.golang.org is missing /doc/style.css and /doc/godocs.js make the site looking like
in 1998 ;-)

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.
open http://tip.golang.org and http://www.golang.org to spot the difference 
2.
when spotted ask someone to look for missing files
3.
-

What is the expected output?
style and docs on tip works and looks the same as on regular page.


What do you see instead?
site without styles


Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
web browser


Which operating system are you using?
any

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
tip!;-)

Please provide any additional information below.
